name: MarksmanVR
detailed_description:
Test your agility and accuracy against hordes of barbarians.
MarksmanVR is an archery defense game based on medieval warfare.
The game is simple and intuitive. Just shoot an arrow at the right target and as your skills improve you will achieve better results.

key Features

  • Projectile physics and bow mechanics based on reality
  • Immersive medieval environment
  • Boss battle at the end of each chapter
  • Combinational skills which are automatically fired (Flame, Push, Multi, Homing, Repair, Manaregen)
  • Enemy can reach you and hurt you
  • Wide range of enemies, from medieval warriors to fantasy monsters.

    My goal is to develop a complete version of the archery experience in terms of both quality and gameplay.
    This game will be on early access until i consider development to be complete.
    Please note that some features of the trailer are currently developing, but you will likely have access to the majority of what the trailer shows during the early access period.

short_description: Let's dive into medieval warfare! Grab a bow and destroy your enemies. Confront the giants. Make your unique 'Power shot' by combining different abilities. Looking for a games like Longbow? This is it!
